Intially when I found out about fibroid I was skeptical on how to go about.  But I was lucky enough to have Doctor Prakash Trivedi on board on recommendation of Nagpur's renowned Doctor Prashant Agnihotri (eye specialist). 


My experience at Total Care Hospital had been extremely satisfactory and pleasant. From the time of my consultation to my surgery and post care recovery stay at the hospital, I was taken care of well by their staff and medical care. Dr. Prakash Trivedi's ********* ********* **** counselling helped me understand the procedure without leaving any doubt on my mind. I'm immensely grateful to Dr. Prakash Trivedi, who is one of the few doctors who make their patients instantly feel relaxed with humble and caring attitude. I can't express enough as to how grateful I am to have come across Dr. Trivedi and Dr. Aditi.


I would also like to thank Dr. Aditi for being available whenever I needed her and answering all my questions patiently with a smiling face during post surgery care. Dr aditi is gem of a person and this can be judged by the way she cares for her patient.


I had travelled to Mumbai alone without my parents due to covid19. *** * *** **** ******* ** * **** * *** *** **** ****** ** *****. He made me feel so comfortable and checked on my health throughout my procedure and hospital care. 


I am grateful to Dr. Prakash and his entire team for making it so easy for me to recover. Indeed I truly believe doctors like him with humble and genuine care, and expertise which truly help patients recover from their health complications. Under the guidance and care of Dr. Prakash Trivedi and Dr. Aditi and nursing by hospital nursing staff, I have recovered in a very short time, which may not have been possible elsewhere.    

My earnest review to reflect my medical  journey and experience for which I am extremely grateful after having come across Total Care Centre Clinic and the safe hands of Dr Prakash Trivedi. I would highly recommend to family, friends and for all the females who struggle to find the right doctor for correct diagnosis and perfect care. This is  one clinic in Mumbai one can trust without any second doubt to go and consult one's medical issues. 


Special thanks to Dr. Prakash and Dr. Aditi, Hemal and the entire team, and of course the reliable and humble staff who took care of me so well. 


Overall I'm forever grateful and for my best of health in future and concerns Total Women's Health Care Centre is the place to go for.

review:
A few days back, I got operated for Total Uterus Removal & Hernia Repair Surgery at Dr. Trivedi's Total Health Care. Dr. Prakash Trivedi who is a very well know & celebrated Doctor/ Surgeon performed this surgery. Inspite of being so well know, reputed and celebrated doctor, he is a very humble, down to earth, very knowledgeable and a very good listener. Dr. Aditi who was attending to me post operation is also a very knowledgeable and humble person.

However, the very first person that we came in contact at the reception was Sonali Nikam. She made us feel completely relaxed and home as soon as we entered the clinic. She is a very helpful, knowledgeable and a person who is willing to go an extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction. Also, another person we met was Hemal who also had the same qualities.

It would be unfair if I don't mention about the hospital staff - i.e. the  Sisters, Mawshi's and other hospital staff. They all were very attentive, supportive and helpful all the time I stayed at the hospital.

The food... how can I forget this. Right from morning tea, breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner...It was the most sattvic, delicious , filling and homemade food that I ever had. The attendant who accompanies the patient also is served the same food. We were given to understand that this food comes from doctors home and is the same food what is served to them at their residence.

All-in-all, a very memorable experience and whenever required, I would highly recommend Dr. Trivedi's Total Health Care to all the Women who are in need for the best doctor and medical care.
